ctx: intros d0 d1 sigma H1 H2.
destruct d0 as [preDTA0 ad0], d1 as [preDTA1 ad1].
exceptions.tactic: apply union_semantics with (t:=a); try assumption; try apply umerge_correct_wrt_sign_invar; try apply H1; try apply H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment preDTA0 : preDTA ad0 : ad preDTA1 : preDTA ad1 : ad sigma : signature H1 : dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta preDTA0 ad0) sigma H2 : dta_correct_wrt_sign (dta preDTA1 ad1) sigma a : ad sigma0 : state Ha : MapGet state (insert_ostate (u_merge preDTA0 preDTA1) (new_preDTA_ad (u_merge preDTA0 preDTA1)) (union_0 (u_merge preDTA0 preDTA1) ad0 ad1)) a = Some sigma0 The term "a" has type "N" while it is expected to have type "term".

original: intros d0 d1 sigma H1 H2. unfold dta_correct_wrt_sign, union. destruct d0 as [preDTA0 ad0], d1 as [preDTA1 ad1]. intros a sigma0 Ha. apply union_semantics with (t:=a); try assumption; try apply umerge_correct_wrt_sign_invar; try apply H1; try apply H2.
